Worth the money.We let the waiter choose what to bring us and weren't disappointed in the least. Salmon thing, meat thing, bread thing, all amazing and perfectly done -- I'll have to go back to get all the names straight. The best in my opinion was definitely the salmon thing.I didn't get any of the 'snoodiness' vibe I've seen mentioned either.I pass by this place often and it's always busy; we made a reservation for lunch but there were plenty of people there without.
